verses.verse: Again the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1961>came<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> me, <S%H559>saying,<s%>
Son <S%H1121><s%> of <S%H120>man,<s%> <S%H853>cause<s%> <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> to <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H853><s%> her <S%H8441>abominations,<s%>

And <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H3541>Thus<s%> <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD<s%> unto <S%H3389>Jerusalem;<s%> Thy <S%H4351>birth<s%> and thy <S%H4138>nativity<s%> is of the <S%H4480>land<s%> <S%H776><s%> of <S%H3669>Canaan;<s%> thy <S%H1>father<s%> was an <S%H567>Amorite,<s%> and thy <S%H517>mother<s%> a <S%H2851>Hittite.<s%>

And as for thy <S%H4138>nativity,<s%> in the <S%H3117>day<s%> thou wast <S%H3205>born<s%> thy <S%H8270>navel<s%> was <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H3772>cut,<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> wast thou <S%H7364>washed<s%> in <S%H4325>water<s%> to <S%H4935>supple<s%> thee; thou wast <S%H3808>not<s%> salted at <S%H4414>all,<s%> <S%H4414><s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> swaddled at <S%H2853>all.<s%> <S%H2853><s%>

None <S%H3808><s%> <S%H5869>eye<s%> <S%H2347>pitied<s%> <S%H5921><s%> thee, to <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H259>any<s%> of <S%H4480>these<s%> <S%H428><s%> unto thee, to have <S%H2550>compassion<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> thee; but thou wast cast <S%H7993>out<s%> <S%H413>in<s%> the <S%H6440>open<s%> <S%H7704>field,<s%> to the <S%H1604>loathing<s%> of thy <S%H5315>person,<s%> in the <S%H3117>day<s%> that thou wast <S%H3205>born.<s%>

And when I <S%H5674>passed<s%> <S%H5921>by<s%> thee, and <S%H7200>saw<s%> thee <S%H947>polluted<s%> in thine own <S%H1818>blood,<s%> I <S%H559>said<s%> unto thee when thou wast in thy <S%H1818>blood,<s%> <S%H2421>Live;<s%> yea, I <S%H559>said<s%> unto thee when thou wast in thy <S%H1818>blood,<s%> <S%H2421>Live.<s%>

I have <S%H5414>caused<s%> thee to <S%H7233>multiply<s%> as the <S%H6780>bud<s%> of the <S%H7704>field,<s%> and thou hast <S%H7235>increased<s%> and waxen <S%H1431>great,<s%> and thou art <S%H935>come<s%> to <S%H5716>excellent<s%> <S%H5716>ornaments:<s%> thy <S%H7699>breasts<s%> are <S%H3559>fashioned,<s%> and thine <S%H8181>hair<s%> is <S%H6779>grown,<s%> whereas <S%H859>thou<s%> wast <S%H5903>naked<s%> and <S%H6181>bare.<s%>

Now when I <S%H5674>passed<s%> <S%H5921>by<s%> thee, and looked <S%H7200>upon<s%> thee, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> thy <S%H6256>time<s%> was the <S%H6256>time<s%> of <S%H1730>love;<s%> and I <S%H6566>spread<s%> my <S%H3671>skirt<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> thee, and <S%H3680>covered<s%> thy <S%H6172>nakedness:<s%> yea, I <S%H7650>swore<s%> unto thee, and <S%H935>entered<s%> into a <S%H1285>covenant<s%> <S%H854>with<s%> thee, <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD,<s%> and thou <S%H1961>becamest<s%> mine.

Then <S%H7364>washed<s%> I thee with <S%H4325>water;<s%> yea, I throughly washed <S%H7857>away<s%> thy <S%H1818>blood<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> <S%H5921><s%> thee, and I <S%H5480>anointed<s%> thee with <S%H8081>oil.<s%>

I <S%H3847>clothed<s%> thee also with embroidered <S%H7553>work,<s%> and <S%H5274>shod<s%> thee with badgers' <S%H8476>skin,<s%> and I girded thee <S%H2280>about<s%> with fine <S%H8336>linen,<s%> and I <S%H3680>covered<s%> thee with <S%H4897>silk.<s%>

I <S%H5710>decked<s%> thee also with <S%H5716>ornaments,<s%> and I <S%H5414>put<s%> <S%H6781>bracelets<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> thy <S%H3027>hands,<s%> and a <S%H7242>chain<s%> <S%H5921>on<s%> thy <S%H1627>neck.<s%>

And I <S%H5414>put<s%> a <S%H5141>jewel<s%> <S%H5921>on<s%> thy <S%H639>forehead,<s%> and <S%H5694>earrings<s%> <S%H5921>in<s%> thine <S%H241>ears,<s%> and a <S%H8597>beautiful<s%> <S%H5850>crown<s%> upon thine <S%H7218>head.<s%>

Thus wast thou <S%H5710>decked<s%> with <S%H2091>gold<s%> and <S%H3701>silver;<s%> and thy <S%H4403>raiment<s%> was of fine <S%H8336>linen,<s%> and <S%H4897>silk,<s%> and embroidered <S%H7553>work;<s%> thou didst <S%H398>eat<s%> fine <S%H5560>flour,<s%> and <S%H1706>honey,<s%> and <S%H8081>oil:<s%> and thou wast exceeding <S%H3302>beautiful,<s%> <S%H3966><s%> <S%H3966><s%> and thou didst <S%H6743>prosper<s%> into a <S%H4410>kingdom.<s%>

And thy <S%H8034>renown<s%> went <S%H3318>forth<s%> among the <S%H1471>heathen<s%> for thy <S%H3308>beauty:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> <S%H1931>it<s%> was <S%H3632>perfect<s%> through my <S%H1926>comeliness,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I had <S%H7760>put<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> thee, <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD.<s%>

But thou didst <S%H982>trust<s%> in thine own <S%H3308>beauty,<s%> and playedst the <S%H2181>harlot<s%> <S%H5921>because<s%> of thy <S%H8034>renown,<s%> and pouredst <S%H8210>out<s%> <S%H853><s%> thy <S%H8457>fornications<s%> <S%H5921>on<s%> every <S%H3605>one<s%> that passed <S%H5674>by;<s%> his it <S%H1961>was.<s%>

And of thy <S%H4480>garments<s%> <S%H899><s%> thou didst <S%H3947>take,<s%> and <S%H6213>deckedst<s%> thy high <S%H1116>places<s%> with divers <S%H2921>colors,<s%> and playedst the <S%H2181>harlot<s%> <S%H5921>thereupon:<s%> the like things shall <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H935>come,<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> shall it <S%H1961>be<s%> so.

Thou hast also <S%H3947>taken<s%> thy <S%H8597>fair<s%> <S%H3627>jewels<s%> of my <S%H4480>gold<s%> <S%H2091><s%> and of my <S%H4480>silver,<s%> <S%H3701><s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I had <S%H5414>given<s%> thee, and <S%H6213>madest<s%> to thyself <S%H6754>images<s%> of <S%H2145>men,<s%> and didst commit <S%H2181>whoredom<s%> with them,

And <S%H3947>tookest<s%> thine <S%H7553>embroidered<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H899>garments,<s%> and <S%H3680>coveredst<s%> them: and thou hast <S%H5414>set<s%> mine <S%H8081>oil<s%> and mine <S%H7004>incense<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> them.

My <S%H3899>meat<s%> also <S%H834>which<s%> I <S%H5414>gave<s%> thee, fine <S%H5560>flour,<s%> and <S%H8081>oil,<s%> and <S%H1706>honey,<s%> wherewith I <S%H398>fed<s%> thee, thou hast even <S%H5414>set<s%> it <S%H6440>before<s%> them for a <S%H5207>sweet<s%> <S%H7381>savor:<s%> and thus it <S%H1961>was,<s%> <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD.<s%>

Moreover thou hast <S%H3947>taken<s%> <S%H853><s%> thy <S%H1121>sons<s%> and thy <S%H1323>daughters,<s%> <S%H834>whom<s%> thou hast <S%H3205>borne<s%> unto me, and these hast thou <S%H2076>sacrificed<s%> unto them to be <S%H398>devoured.<s%> Is this <S%H4480>of<s%> thy <S%H8457>whoredoms<s%> a small <S%H4592>matter,<s%>
That thou hast <S%H7819>slain<s%> <S%H853><s%> my <S%H1121>children,<s%> and <S%H5414>delivered<s%> them to cause them to pass <S%H5674>through<s%> the fire for them?

And in <S%H3605>all<s%> thine <S%H8441>abominations<s%> and thy <S%H8457>whoredoms<s%> thou hast <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H2142>remembered<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H3117>days<s%> of thy <S%H5271>youth,<s%> when thou <S%H1961>wast<s%> <S%H5903>naked<s%> and <S%H6181>bare,<s%> and <S%H1961>wast<s%> <S%H947>polluted<s%> in thy <S%H1818>blood.<s%>

And it came to <S%H1961>pass<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> thy <S%H7451>wickedness,<s%> <S%H188>(woe,<s%> <S%H188>woe<s%> unto thee! <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD;)<s%>
That thou hast also <S%H1129>built<s%> unto thee an eminent <S%H1354>place,<s%> and hast <S%H6213>made<s%> thee a high <S%H7413>place<s%> in <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H7339>street.<s%>

Thou hast <S%H1129>built<s%> thy high <S%H7413>place<s%> <S%H413>at<s%> <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H7218>head<s%> of the <S%H1870>way,<s%> and hast <S%H853>made<s%> thy <S%H3308>beauty<s%> to be <S%H8581>abhorred,<s%> and hast <S%H6589>opened<s%> <S%H853><s%> thy <S%H7272>feet<s%> to every <S%H3605>one<s%> that passed <S%H5674>by,<s%> and <S%H7235>multiplied<s%> <S%H853><s%> thy <S%H8457>whoredoms.<s%>

Thou hast also committed <S%H2181>fornication<s%> <S%H413>with<s%> the <S%H1121>Egyptians<s%> <S%H4714><s%> thy <S%H7934>neighbors,<s%> <S%H1432>great<s%> of <S%H1320>flesh;<s%> and hast <S%H7235>increased<s%> <S%H853><s%> thy <S%H8457>whoredoms,<s%> to provoke me to <S%H3707>anger.<s%>

Behold, <S%H2009><s%> therefore I have stretched <S%H5186>out<s%> my <S%H3027>hand<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> thee, and have <S%H1639>diminished<s%> thine <S%H2706>ordinary<s%> food, and <S%H5414>delivered<s%> thee unto the <S%H5315>will<s%> of them that <S%H8130>hate<s%> thee, the <S%H1323>daughters<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines,<s%> which are <S%H3637>ashamed<s%> of thy <S%H2154>lewd<s%> <S%H4480>way.<s%> <S%H1870><s%>

Thou hast played the <S%H2181>whore<s%> also <S%H413>with<s%> the <S%H1121>Assyrians,<s%> <S%H804><s%> because thou wast <S%H4480>unsatiable;<s%> <S%H1115><s%> <S%H7654><s%> yea, thou hast played the <S%H2181>harlot<s%> with them, and <S%H1571>yet<s%> couldest <S%H3808>not<s%> be <S%H7646>satisfied.<s%>

Thou hast moreover <S%H7235>multiplied<s%> <S%H853><s%> thy <S%H8457>fornication<s%> <S%H413>in<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan<s%> unto <S%H3778>Chaldea;<s%> and <S%H1571>yet<s%> thou wast <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H7646>satisfied<s%> <S%H2063>herewith.<s%>

How <S%H4100><s%> <S%H535>weak<s%> is thine <S%H3826>heart,<s%> <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD,<s%> seeing thou <S%H6213>doest<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> things, the <S%H4639>work<s%> of an <S%H7986>imperious<s%> <S%H2181>whorish<s%> <S%H802>woman;<s%>

In that thou <S%H1129>buildest<s%> thine eminent <S%H1354>place<s%> in the <S%H7218>head<s%> of <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H1870>way,<s%> and <S%H6213>makest<s%> thine high <S%H7413>place<s%> in <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H7339>street;<s%> and hast <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H1961>been<s%> as a <S%H2181>harlot,<s%> in that thou <S%H7046>scornest<s%> <S%H868>hire;<s%>
But as a <S%H802>wife<s%> that committeth <S%H5003>adultery,<s%> which <S%H3947>taketh<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H2114>strangers<s%> <S%H8478>instead<s%> of her <S%H376>husband!<s%>

They <S%H5414>give<s%> <S%H5078>gifts<s%> to <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H2181>whores:<s%> but <S%H859>thou<s%> <S%H5414>givest<s%> <S%H853><s%> thy <S%H5083>gifts<s%> to <S%H3605>all<s%> thy <S%H157>lovers,<s%> and <S%H7809>hirest<s%> them, that they may <S%H935>come<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> thee on every <S%H4480>side<s%> <S%H5439><s%> for thy <S%H8457>whoredom.<s%>

And the <S%H2016>contrary<s%> <S%H1961>is<s%> in thee <S%H4480>from<s%> other <S%H802>women<s%> in thy <S%H8457>whoredoms,<s%> whereas <S%H3808>none<s%> <S%H310>followeth<s%> thee to commit <S%H2181>whoredoms:<s%> and in that thou <S%H5414>givest<s%> a <S%H868>reward,<s%> and <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H868>reward<s%> is <S%H5414>given<s%> unto thee, therefore thou <S%H1961>art<s%> <S%H2016>contrary.<s%>
Wherefore, <S%H3651><s%> O <S%H2181>harlot,<s%> <S%H8085>hear<s%> the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the LORD: <S%H3068><s%>

Thus <S%H3541><s%> <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD;<s%> <S%H3282>Because<s%> thy <S%H5178>filthiness<s%> was poured <S%H8210>out,<s%> and thy <S%H6172>nakedness<s%> <S%H1540>discovered<s%> through thy <S%H8457>whoredoms<s%> <S%H5921>with<s%> thy <S%H157>lovers,<s%> and <S%H5921>with<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1544>idols<s%> of thy <S%H8441>abominations,<s%> and by the <S%H1818>blood<s%> of thy <S%H1121>children,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> thou didst <S%H5414>give<s%> unto them;

Behold, <S%H2009><s%> <S%H3651>therefore<s%> I will <S%H6908>gather<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> thy <S%H157>lovers,<s%> <S%H5921>with<s%> <S%H834>whom<s%> thou hast taken <S%H6149>pleasure,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> them <S%H834>that<s%> thou hast <S%H157>loved,<s%> <S%H5921>with<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> them <S%H834>that<s%> thou hast <S%H8130>hated;<s%> I will even <S%H6908>gather<s%> them round <S%H4480>about<s%> <S%H5439><s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> thee, and will <S%H1540>discover<s%> thy <S%H6172>nakedness<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> them, that they may <S%H7200>see<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> thy <S%H6172>nakedness.<s%>

And I will <S%H8199>judge<s%> thee, as women that break <S%H5003>wedlock<s%> and <S%H8210>shed<s%> <S%H1818>blood<s%> are <S%H4941>judged;<s%> and I will <S%H5414>give<s%> thee <S%H1818>blood<s%> in <S%H2534>fury<s%> and <S%H7068>jealousy.<s%>

And I will also <S%H5414>give<s%> thee into their <S%H3027>hand,<s%> and they shall throw <S%H2040>down<s%> thine eminent <S%H1354>place,<s%> and shall break <S%H5422>down<s%> thy high <S%H7413>places:<s%> they shall <S%H6584>strip<s%> thee also of thy <S%H899>clothes,<s%> and shall <S%H3947>take<s%> thy <S%H8597>fair<s%> <S%H3627>jewels,<s%> and <S%H5117>leave<s%> thee <S%H5903>naked<s%> and <S%H6181>bare.<s%>

They shall also bring <S%H5927>up<s%> a <S%H6951>company<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> thee, and they shall <S%H7275>stone<s%> thee with <S%H68>stones,<s%> and thrust thee <S%H1333>through<s%> with their <S%H2719>swords.<s%>

And they shall <S%H8313>burn<s%> thine <S%H1004>houses<s%> with <S%H784>fire,<s%> and <S%H6213>execute<s%> <S%H8201>judgments<s%> upon thee in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H802>women:<s%> and I will cause thee to <S%H7673>cease<s%> from playing the <S%H4480>harlot,<s%> <S%H2181><s%> and thou <S%H1571>also<s%> shalt <S%H5414>give<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H868>hire<s%> any <S%H5750>more.<s%>

So will I make my <S%H2534>fury<s%> toward thee to <S%H5117>rest,<s%> and my <S%H7068>jealousy<s%> shall <S%H5493>depart<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> thee, and I will be <S%H8252>quiet,<s%> and will be <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H5750>more<s%> <S%H3707>angry.<s%>

Because <S%H3282><s%> <S%H834><s%> thou hast <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H2142>remembered<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H3117>days<s%> of thy <S%H5271>youth,<s%> but hast <S%H7264>fretted<s%> me in <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> things; <S%H1887>behold,<s%> therefore <S%H589>I<s%> <S%H1571>also<s%> will <S%H5414>recompense<s%> thy <S%H1870>way<s%> upon thine <S%H7218>head,<s%> <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD:<s%> and thou shalt <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H6213>commit<s%> <S%H853><s%> this <S%H2154>lewdness<s%> <S%H5921>above<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> thine <S%H8441>abominations.<s%>

Behold, <S%H2009><s%> every <S%H3605>one<s%> that useth <S%H4911>proverbs<s%> shall use this <S%H4911>proverb<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> thee, <S%H559>saying,<s%> As is the <S%H517>mother,<s%> so is her <S%H1323>daughter.<s%>

Thou <S%H859><s%> art thy <S%H517>mother's<s%> <S%H1323>daughter,<s%> that <S%H1602>loatheth<s%> her <S%H376>husband<s%> and her <S%H1121>children;<s%> and <S%H859>thou<s%> art the <S%H269>sister<s%> of thy <S%H269>sisters,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H1602>loathed<s%> their <S%H376>husbands<s%> and their <S%H1121>children:<s%> your <S%H517>mother<s%> was a <S%H2851>Hittite,<s%> and your <S%H1>father<s%> an <S%H567>Amorite.<s%>
